name: I Reboot
description:
Your mission is to neutralize an out of control IA driven drone named L.O.O.P.

But it has the special ability to copy your recent actions... Watch Out !

Made by Quasar Shrine people :

Arktas, Lut1n, WegPast

UPDATE :

V1.1 : 

- Added a background to the playground so there no more ugly "blue box" around the map

Music from "Komiku" : https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_
